alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Pine; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 12:26AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL AITKIN, NORTH CENTRAL PINE AND SOUTHWESTERN CARLTON COUNTIES THROUGH 100 AM CDT... At 1226 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Mille Lacs Band East Lake Area, or 23 miles southeast of Big Sandy Lake, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kettle River, Sturgeon Lake, Automba, Denham, Arthyde, Moose Lake State Park, and Ronald. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive through flood waters.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Pine; South Aitkin
